#summary PIE Function : Loops

= PIE Function : Loops =

Loops are used to repeat parts of code for a specific number of times or forever.

== Infinite Loop Example ==

This will continually run the code at <YOUR CODE GOES HERE>.

<font color = "blue">do forever</font><br>
<YOUR CODE GOES HERE> <br>
<font color = "blue">end do</font>
 
== Loop Example ==

This will run the code at <YOUR CODE GOES HERE> 8 times

<font color = "blue">do </font> 8 <font color = "blue">times</font><br>
<YOUR CODE GOES HERE> <br>
<font color = "blue">end do</font>
